name: attributeEndsWith
title: Attribute Ends With Selector [name$="value"]
desc: Selects elements that have the specified attribute with a value ending exactly with a given string. The comparison is case sensitive.

argument.desc: An attribute value. Can be either an unquoted single word or a quoted string.
argument.name: value

examples.desc: Finds all inputs with an attribute name that ends with 'letter' and puts text in them.
